doc.field: 1988, 1989 court documents: charges depositions, transcripts of proceedings, applications to the court; Reports to the IBT from the independent administrator, 1989-1990; 1991 Eastern Conference vote tally for IBT elections; Local 63; Delagates information for 1991 Convention; Carey materials; lists of locals; newspaper clippings.
